title: Identification (com.apple.configurationprofile.identification)
description: The payload that configures the names of the account user.

PayloadIdentification.title: PayloadIdentification
PayloadIdentification.description: The dictionary that contains details about the user.

FullName.title: Full Name
FullName.description: The full name of the account.

UserName.title: Username
UserName.description: The UNIX user name for the accounts.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: The password for the account. Required when the 'AuthMethod' is 'Password'.

AuthMethod.title: Authentication Method
AuthMethod.description: The authorization method. Either the profile contains the password or the user provides it.

Prompt.title: Prompt
Prompt.description: The custom instructions for the user, if needed.

PromptMessage.title: Prompt Message
PromptMessage.description: The additional descriptive text for the user prompt.
